html:
Listen to a recap of the top stories of the day from 9to5Mac. 9to5Mac Daily is available on iTunes and Apple’s Podcasts app, Stitcher, TuneIn, Google Play, or through our dedicated RSS feed for Overcast and other podcast players.

Sponsored by Dreame Technologies: This Black Friday, discover Dreame Technologies’ innovative family of smart home cleaning solutions—designed to revolutionize your cleaning routine! Don’t miss out on groundbreaking deals, plus enjoy an extra 5% off with code DM9to55off at checkout. Experience the future of cleaning today!

New episodes of 9to5Mac Daily are recorded every weekday. Subscribe to our podcast in Apple Podcast or your favorite podcast player to guarantee new episodes are delivered as soon as they’re available.

Stories discussed in this episode:

  • Apple Card Savings Account gets another interest rate cut
  • Software issues delay HomePod with display until late 2025 – Kuo
  • Kuo: Next iPad Pro with M5 chip coming in fall 2025
  • Apple targeting March release for new wall-mounted smart display product: report
  • Report: 2026 iPhone will prioritize AI upgrades by reworking RAM setup
